text: Sony Pictures just released the third trailer for ` ` Spider - Man : Homecoming'' giving audiences a better idea of just how involved Tony Stark ( a. k. a. Iron Man ) will be in Peter Parker's journey to becoming a superhero in his own right. 60 Actors You Forgot Appeared in Marvel Movies Complicating matters is the untimely arrival of Vulture ( Michael Keaton ), who has been terrorizing the residents of New York City. ` ` The world's changing, boys,'' he says in the way only a villain can. ` ` It's time we change, too.''
